name: Taurus
description: Minodite, god of Taurus, rules strength, prosperity and diligence, granting the world vigor and abundance.

skills.name: Face Me, Worms!
skills.description: Taurus taunts surrounding enemies for 3s and swings his axe to deal DMG equal to 360% of his ATK to them, restoring 10% of his max HP for each enemy hit.

upgrades.level2: Grants a shield equal to 25% of max HP upon casting.

skills.name: Asking For A Fight?
skills.description: Casts Earthsplitter forward, dealing DMG equal to 210% of ATK to enemies and reducing their ATK by 20% for 10s.

skills.name: Old Ox Stands!
skills.description: aunts an enemy for 3s and restores HP equal to 270% of ATK. This skill prioritizes enemies who are attacking the most vulnerable ally.

upgrades.level3: Increases Armor and M-RES by 50% for 3s.
